page.title: 08Leisure Persuits In Garston
page.content: Monday: I go swimming to all sorts of different baths in my spare time because it is my favourite sport. I also like going to{Brownies}because we play games and go on outings. Tuesday: I do my Homework and then watch television. If it is not raining I sometimes play outside. Wednesday: I watch television or play out. Later I go{swimming.} Thursday: After school I go to Modern Ballet, Tap{Dancing}and Disco Classes then attend a{computer club.} Friday: I play outside then I go to the baths to swim. Saturday: I watch{television}then go out for the rest of the morning. I often watch television in the afternoon. Sunday: I go swimming in the morning but in Summer I play outside. RACHAEL CHRISTIE (9)
